name: Kuzgakai's Dungeon
description:
One day you receive a message from your friend, but it was so strange... that night something happened. the Nightmare becomes real... or It was just another dream?... What would you do if your worst nightmare becomes an arcade?... Are you ready to face it? Are you ready to pay for your murder?

Features
  • 9 different weapons
  • Tutorial level
  • 5  level with higher difficult
  • A short patience level
  • Other Easter Eggs...
Controls
  • Choose options with arrow keys
  • Select with Enter
  • Move with W A S D
  • Shoot with Left Click or Left Control
  • Interact with Q
  • Change weapon with E
  • Run with Shift
  • Pause with P
  • Go fullscreen with F
Requirements
  • Windows XP or higher  x64 / x86
  • Intel Core 2 Duo or higher
  • Ram 1Gb or higher
  • No dedicated GPU required (works well with Integrated)
  • DirectX 8 or higher (not tested with earlier ones)
Bug Report

Did you find a bug? if so, please fill this form to report it.

Suggestions

If you have any suggestions for improving my game, please send me a DM on my Twitter

One last thing

If you like my game, and you want to help me, you can donate or, if you can't or you don't want to, you can follow me on Twitter, that will help me a lot!
